text: a long time ago in a small little town
there lived an old toymaker named
geppetto he was a toy maker who carved
wooden toys
to sell to the town's folk he loved
blessing children
but was sad that he never had a family
of his own
he often wished he would still have a
son someday
and one day what a perfect walking in
the woods
with this i will be able to he saw the
perfect
log for his next toy project
geppetto took the log on his back
and carried it to his workshop he put
the log on his table
and started to carve but as he was
carving
he heard a little voice coming from the
log
geppetto was surprised and thought he
must have been hearing voices from the
children in the town
geppetto kept on carving but then
he heard the same voice again hello
hello
hello are you telling me
i must be getting really old hello hello
i'm hearing voices gepetto kept on
working
carving one piece at a time
first he finished the head then his body
his arms and his legs and feet
geppetto finally finished the puppet set
him on a chair
and started to tidy up his workshop
but then he heard the voice again
[Music]
geppetto looked around stunned i am
low but he could not see anybody else
than the wooden puppet
so he kept on with his work
and then the new puppet started to move
he jumped down from the chair and
started dancing in the room
gelato couldn't believe his eyes
of course it wasn't a real kid but it
sure
laughed talked and played like one you
my puppet you're uh dancing
[Music]
oh geppetto held the puppet
in his arms from now on your name shall
be
pinocchio my child
geppetto was so happy to have pinocchio
there
and he began to teach him about being a
boy
after the summer was over it was time
for pinocchio to go to school
but geppetto did not have the money to
buy pinocchio his school supplies
so he sold his code and gave the money
to pinocchio
for buying school books pinocchio took
the money
and joyfully walked through the town
watching all the people in the
marketplace
and the shops along the way at the edge
of town
he saw a big crowd that had gathered for
the circus
to find out what was going on he walked
through the crowd
it wasn't hard because he was so short
the people didn't notice he was made of
wood
and just assumed he was a real boy
pinocchio saw the huge circus tent
with a clown in front calling out to the
crowd to come see
come one come all see the amazing circus
pinocchio thought it sounded like fun so
he went up to the clown
but the clown stopped him and said
hey you can't go to the show you gotta
have the dough
you gotta have money for the ticket
pinocchio thought for a while
and remembered the money geppetto gave
him for school
hmm i have money he took the money out
of his pocket
and gave it to the club inside the tent
pinocchio saw a large stage with a
puppet show
he thought perhaps those puppets were
alive too hey
what in toys what are you playing
jumping on the stage
pinocchio started to dance amongst the
puppets but since he wasn't part
of the show the crowd thought he was
just a boy messing up the story
but the puppet master above the stage
could see that he was wooden he was
shocked to see a puppet without strings
i popped out the strings were to make me
a
lot of money
and as soon as the show was over he
caught pinocchio
and put him in a cage pinocchio was
very upset that he did not listen to
geppetto
to use the money for school books and to
go to school
seeing how regretful pinocchio was a
fairy appeared right next to him
who are you i'm the one that brought you
to life for gepetto
you should have done what your father
told you to do
i am glad you know that you were wrong
to disobey
so i have decided to save you from this
cage
thank you miss fairy can you help me go
to school
the fairy cast a spell and money
appeared in pinocchio's hand
go straight to school do not waste this
money
the fairy took pinocchio out of the
circus
pinocchio was on his way to school once
again and began to sing along the way
[Music]
a shifty fox and his friend the cat
stepped out in front of pinocchio they
saw the money
and they wanted to trick pinocchio to
take his money away
hello there where are you going so
musically
i'm gonna go buy some school books this
won't be enough money for
school books but i know a way you can
grow
more money what do you want me to do
there's a magic field nearby
give me the money and i'll plant it so
you can have
a money tree and pick new money whenever
you need it
pinocchio wasn't very old and he
believed anything the fox had said
and gave away his money the fox and the
cat quickly snatched the money and
ran away pinocchio was left all alone
and started to wonder if he had been
tricked and then
the fairy appeared again why aren't you
still at school
did you get the school books with the
money i gave you
the fairy knew that he had given his
money away to the fox
um and she warned pinocchio
don't lie to me pinocchio tell me the
truth
pinocchio did not listen to the fairy
and chose to lie
about the money but i bought for books
but
i love to film at school as soon as
pinocchio finished his sentence
his nose started to grow
[Music]
are you telling the truth as he told
more lies pinocchio's nose kept growing
longer and longer
until it was so long he couldn't even
move his head very well
finally he realized his nose was growing
because he was lying
ah ah my nose what's going on
he told the fairy the truth and she was
pleased
that he chose the right thing so she
used her magic wand
and changed his nose back to the right
size
i am forgiving you because you told the
truth
the fairy used her wand again to make
more money and once again
warned pinocchio not to waste any more
of his money
do not waste this money
holding the money in his hand pinocchio
started walking towards town again
but when he got into town he ran into
the mean puppet master from the circus
the puppet master was very upset that
pinocchio had escaped
and thought it would be best if
pinocchio disappeared
so he caught pinocchio and threw him
into the sea
but when pinocchio fell into the sea he
did not sink
he stayed afloat on the water because he
was made of
wood oh i felt pinocchio really liked
this feeling
and started to play and swim in the
water
he played so long that suddenly he heard
a splash
and everything went dark hey what's
going on
where was i pinocchio suddenly found
himself in a dark place
he looked around but could not see a way
out
[Music]
pinocchio had been swallowed by a giant
fish
and now he was sitting right in the
middle of his stomach
back at home geppetto was worried about
pinocchio
and he went out to search for him
eventually
he came to the far side of the town
where the seashore was
he asked the fishermen whether they had
seen his son or not
one of the fishermen remembered seeing
pinocchio swimming in the water
have you seen my son about this tall
made of
wood geppetto asked the fisherman for
help
knowing how good a person geppetto was
the fisherman wanted to help him
so they gave him a small boat to save
pinocchio
[Music]
geppetto jumped on the boat and sailed
to the sea
but then it started to rain more and
more
gepetto was in a storm
the small boat couldn't handle the big
waves and sunk beneath the water
found himself in the middle of the sea
gepetto could not swim above the giant
waves
and sank deeper and deeper into the
water
but then a giant fish came
it was the fish that had swallowed
pinocchio
and it also swallowed up geppetto
geppetto slid down the fish's throat
right into his stomach and then
he heard the crying voice of a child
he recognized the voice right away
pinocchio
pinocchio my son i finally found you
hearing his father's voice i was so
worried
pinocchio hugged geppetto
i'm so sorry i didn't listen to you
daddy
i will always try to do what you say the
fairy heard pinocchio
say he was sorry and appeared inside the
fish to rescue them
she used a magic bubble to take geppetto
and pinocchio
out of the fish's belly and they floated
back to the shore
pinocchio had become much wiser after
all this
and from then on he always listened to
his father
he went to school every day and always
came home
right away to help his father in his
workshop
the very saw what a nice boy pinocchio
had become
and decided to give him a special gift
one night when pinocchio was sleeping
she came next to his bed
and used her magic wand
in the morning pinocchio woke up to get
ready for school
and as he was getting out of bed he
realized
that something was different he saw his
hands
and legs and feet he was shocked
he was not made of wood anymore he was a
normal boy
no longer made of wood he jumped from
his bed and
joyfully ran next to his father daddy
daddy daddy look at me
seeing pinocchio as a real boy made
gepetto
very happy oh my son
you're a real boy now
pinocchio father and son
hugged each other with tears of joy
pinocchio
always told the truth and his nose never
grew long
again

once upon a time they lived to miller
and his beautiful
daughter
the miller always dreamt of being rich
because of this
all he ever did was lie to people around
him
the fame of the miller's story went all
the way to the king
[Music]
calling him to the castle the king
decided to give the miller a lesson
but the miller didn't hesitate on lying
to him
your highness my daughter can turn straw
into gold threads the king did not
believe him
okay if you say so bring her here
tomorrow show us how so that we can
believe you
when the miller told his daughter she
was furious
father you lied again what am i going to
do now
her father was very embarrassed the
following day helplessly
the miller and his daughter went to the
king
the king took the girl into a room in
the room
where a spinning wheel and a basket full
of straw for her to string
my sunrise i want you to turn all the
straw into gold
if you don't a very big punishment will
be waiting for you
the king had the miller locked in the
dungeon
as for his daughter he placed two guards
at her door
the girl looked at both the straw and
the spinning wheel
and helplessly began to cry
[Music]
oh daddy
suddenly a light appeared in the room
when the light disappeared a small
ugly elf appeared the girl looked at the
little man with great confusion
and why might you be crying the king
wants me to turn this draw into gold
but i can't do it i can't do this for
you
but i wonder what you can give me in
return
the girl took her necklace off and gave
it to the elf
as soon as the elf got the necklace he
sat in front of the spinning wheel and
began to spin the straw round and round
as the wheel began to spin
the pulley started to fill with golden
string
in a short while the elf turned all the
straw into gold
and just as he had appeared he
disappeared
it was now morning the king entered the
room and once he saw the pulleys he was
amazed
i thought your father was a liar he has
amazed me
the girl thought about escaping and was
very happy
but the king just brought in more straw
if you want to be free you must turn all
the straw into gold by morning
the girl began to cry once again and the
ugly elf
appeared i can turn these into gold as
well
but what will he give me in return
the girl reached to her precious ring
and gave it to the little man
i can give you this very precious ring
which was given to me by my mother
the elf got the ring and began to spin
the straw
round and round as the will turn the
pulley filled with golden string
by the morning it all finished
the baskets were full of gold when the
king entered the room he was
very happy this time he filled the whole
room with straw
if you manage to turn all destroy into
gold i'm going to forgive both
you and your father in fact i'm going to
ask for you to be my queen
as soon as the king left the room the
elf appeared once again
but this time there was nothing that the
girl could give him
the elf said after you marry the king
you must give me the child you give
birth to
this way i will turn all this straw into
gold
helplessly the girl accepted his offer
this time round
the elf began to work much faster
round and round as the spinning wheel
spun the pulley began to fill with gold
it was morning once again and the king
entered
he saw the gold and was very happy
he proposed to the girl the girl was now
a queen
after a short time had passed the queen
had a child
one day when the queen was putting her
baby to sleep the elf
appeared did you forget the promise you
gave me
no i have not but please don't take my
baby away
the owl felt sorry for the queen and
gave her one chance
if in three days you find out what my
name is
you can keep your child
once the out disappeared the queen began
to think
she called the guard and got him to make
a list of all the names in the country
[Music]
the guard made a list of all the names
on a piece of paper
and by morning bring it to the queen
in the morning the elf reappeared
and asked the queen what his name was
and so the queen began to read all the
names on the piece of paper
is it david no robert no
tom peter oh
after the queen finished reading out all
the names the elf said none of them
i'm leaving now but i will be back
tomorrow
and he disappeared
the queen called the guard and this time
asked the guard to make a list of all
the names in the neighboring kingdoms
before it was morning the guard wrote
down
all the names he found on a piece of
paper and gave it to the queen
when the sun rose the alf reappeared
so were we able to find my name
balthazar
no hans no mustafa
no matter how many names she counted she
just
couldn't find it tomorrow is the last
day
i'll be back but you don't stand a
chance
the elf disappeared once again the queen
called the guard and this time asked
that they traveled
more countries and got more names
at sunrise the guard made his way to the

had seen
the night before
while i was walking in the forest i saw
a small house and there were talking
trees
and the dwarf jumping around the fire
singing a song
the baby will be mine she will be
my sunshine for this moment i've been
waiting
my name is rumpelstiltskin

the queen was very happy to hear all
that was said
and so it was morning and the elf
reappeared when he asked the queen what

the queen made it as if she didn't know
his name
and began to count different names
shaking his head the elf kept on saying
no
as the queen got the wrong answers he
just got
happier and happier

in the end the queen said his name
is it rumpelstiltskin

once upon a time there lived an arrogant

in a faraway kingdom

looked good

the mirror

how do i look at taylor does it fit me
of course it does my emperor whatever
you try on fits you well

there were colorful fabrics accessories

one day two con men came by to the
market

this is very bad

threads once upon a time
in a beautiful town located at the very
top
there was the statue of the happy prince
the statue was covered with gold from
head to toe
and there was a big red ruby on the
handle of his sword
and as for the prince's eyes they were
two sparkling
green emeralds
the statue of the happy prince could be
seen by everyone in town
and it was known to spread hope and
happiness to all
one night a little swallow came to town
her friends flew to warmer parts of the
world to be protected from the cold
but she was left behind
she saw the statue which was resting on
a big
column let me spend the night here
tomorrow i'll continue
the swallow landed right between the
happy prince's feet
tonight i'm going to sleep in a garden
bed
when she was getting ready to sleep
putting her wing over her head
suddenly a drop of water fell on her
head
she looked up
but the sky was clear and it wasn't
raining
right at that moment another drop of
water landed on her beak
followed by another to understand what
was going on the swallow flew
up on the statue's head
[Music]
she saw that the drops were coming from
the prince's eyes
they were his teardrops
[Music]
happy princess tea drops were running
down on his cheek
and dropping on his feet and his sad
eyes were sparkling in the moonlight the
swallow felt
really sad for him
hello and who are you i am the happy
prince
and then why are you crying when i was
alive
and my heart was a human heart i never
shed a tear
because i lived in a palace where we did
not know what sadness was
during the day i used to play with my
friends in the garden
and at night time i would dance in the
big ballroom
there was a big wall surrounding the
garden but i never wondered what was
behind the wall
everything around me was so beautiful
and they always called me happy prince
and i was very happy indeed however when
my life ended
they put me here on top of this hill and
now i can see
all the ugliness and the poverty around
me
although my heart is made of lead there
is nothing i can do but cry
the swallow was very sad
there is a torn down small house in a
little alley
far from here one of the windows is open
and i can see a woman working on the
sewing machine
her face is weak and tired on the corner
of the bed
her little son is lying down sick
he has fever but his mother has no money
dear swallow
can you take out the precious ruby on my

after a little bit of rest i must keep

at least stay here tonight tomorrow you

was

this is a young writer and he is trying

but he doesn't have any wood to burn or

don't you want to help him the

accepted to stay one more night just to
